subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Since Wayne Gretzky rewrote the N.H.L.’s record books in the ’80s and ’90s, Canada has searched for the next Great One. John Tavares is the latest to earn such comparisons.
snippet: Since Wayne Gretzky rewrote the N.H.L.’s record books in the ’80s and ’90s, Canada has searched for the next Great One. John Tavares is the latest to earn such comparisons.
